desc: Our Yay4Play education kits are based on the global Six Bricks Methodology, play-based activities that help children develop key skills as fine and gross motor skills, literacy, numeracy, emotional intelligence, and many others.

layout.text: Yay4Play is based on the world renowned Six Bricks Method. Our educational activity kits help children understand abstract concepts and develop essential skills for school success. Our kits are suitable for both parents and educators. Use Yay4Play to gain skills through meaningful play - at school or at home with friends and the family. Yay for that!
